headline: Fitch Affirms Invesco at 'A'; Outlook Stable
summary: Fitch Ratings has affirmed the Long-Term Issuer Default Rating of Invesco Ltd. and its debt-issuing subsidiary, Invesco Finance PLC , at 'A'.Fitch has also affirmed Invesco's unsecured debt rating...
